QuestData.Title: Cleansing Drak'Tharon
QuestData.Description: Drak'Tharon soon be cleansed of them foul undead and restored to her noble purpose. In return for your help, the keep's most valuable treasures be yours, mon!$b$bOnce ya be reachin' its top, ya must summon me, and I'll perform the ritual.$b$bAlas, my summonin' will be comin' at a cost. Ya must collect mojo from the survivors.
QuestData.LogDescription: Drakuru wants you to use Drakuru's Elixir at his brazier inside Drak'Tharon. Using Drakuru's Elixir there will require 5 Enduring Mojo.
QuestData.RewardText: We done a great thing, mon! And dis just be da beginning....$B$BSeek me out in Zul'Drak when da time be right.$B$BDere be a war to be won, mon!
